entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
